text_block_list.text: The day of the qualifying race…
I'd hoped to make an offer to be Manhattan Cafe's trainer… but the chance hadn't come up…

text_block_list.name: Colleague A
text_block_list.text: Wait, wait, <username>. You're not seriously planning on scouting HER are you?

text_block_list.name: Colleague B
text_block_list.text: I mean sure, she can run, but when I talked to her she just started talking nonsense about her imaginary friend… She say that to you too?
choice_data_list: I think her friend is real.

text_block_list.name: Colleague A
text_block_list.text: What? Surely not. I mean, I can see why you might want to humor her, but come on…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Good… morning.

text_block_list.name: Both
text_block_list.text: Uwaaaaa!? Gyaaaaaa!?
(Dashdashdashdash…!!)

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: …… Sorry… to interrupt.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: She's here.
There were a lot of other fast Uma Musume lining up that day. She'd be better off concentrating on them rather than chasing her friend…
choice_data_list: Just relax and run your own race!

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: I know you… can't see her… But… it feels almost as if you do…

text_block_list.name: Selection Race Official A
text_block_list.text: The race is about to begin! All starters, make your way to the track!

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Meet me here… tonight.

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: All the Uma Musume are in the starting gates, and… they're off!

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: (Run… run… run… The smell of the grass… Good legs, good turf… today feels right…)

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: (It's as though his words… trainer-san's words… have made my feet lighter… My breathing is calm, controlled… I could run forever…)

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: (There are many Uma Musume ahead of me…)

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: (But ahead of them… I know… My friend is waiting for me…)

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: (My dear friend… who none but I have eyes to see…)

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: (I never cared if people believed in her or not… Only… that they show her respect……)

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: (But…)

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: (He said… he wants to know…)

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: (Because he cannot see her… he wants me to teach him… He speaks of my friend like any other person… with respect…)

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Haaaaaaaaa!!

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: (No matter what anyone might say… whatever their cruel words… They cannot understand… they cannot judge us…)

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: (So I'll leave it behind, all of it… I'll follow you. I'll chase you. Every day, closer than the day before…)

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Closer to that shadow… that dream… For as long as it takes.

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Look at that acceleration! A black shadow! Consuming everything in its path!
(Wooooooaaaaaaahh!!!!)
Manhattan Cafe stood waiting. The track was silent, the crowds and noise of the day's race a distant memory.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Please… listen to what I have to say. It's about… my friend…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: I can …see things. Things that others can't. Mysterious things. Mysterious people.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: But… nobody ever believed me.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: "They're not there," they'd say. "You're scaring me…" "You're hallucinating…" "It's just your imagination… just your mind playing tricks…"

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: To hear so many cruel words spoken about my special friends… made me so sad.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: That's why… When I was still very small… I decided to close myself off. So my dear friends wouldn't be hurt any more.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: I was already a weak child… sickly… So when I hid myself away, nobody tried to stop me.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: But… one day… I saw one who looked just like me… Running……

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: I couldn't see her face, but …I could feel her joy… And I knew …I wanted to feel that joy too…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: I burst out of the dark room where I'd been hiding all those years…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: The sun was so bright… it burned my eyes, but… My friend was running… joyful…!

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: And I asked myself… just what had I been worried about all this time…? Because even if no one believed in her… She still ran with that same joy…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: And ever since then, my friend has kept on running… just ahead of me…
choice_data_list: I can tell your friend is very important to you.
I can tell your friend is very important to you.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: She is… But…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Even I don't really know her… To this day… I have never seen her face.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Because I can't catch her. She never turns to look at me… All I have ever seen… is her back…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: I need to catch her. And run together with her, side by side.
In her small voice, barely a whisper… I could sense a powerful, unwavering will.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: You… still can't see her… can you…? But… um…
choice_data_list: You'll just have to be my eyes.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Will I… catch her…?

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Alright.
(bonk!)
Just as I smiled back at Manhattan Cafe, I felt a powerful whack between my shoulder blades…
A voice without voice… words without words… But whatever it was, it was real.
